name: Ghost Detective
description:
Team: Hydro Shock
Programmer: Zack & Angelo
Modeler: Marshal
Play Tester: Evan

The name is Zack , am a detective or at least i was. i don't recall how i got here but now i stuck in this house with these funny looking humans. All i remember is someone voice in my head telling me to get CANDLES. I don't know what that means but i have a funny feeling that i should listen to what the voice is telling me to do.

You are stuck in limbo with the only way out is by finding the portal. Use your wits and memory to find all the candles and get yourself to pass to the after life.Explore and look up and down for those candles. Some will be easy but other will challenge your detective skills. ARE YOU UP FOR THE CHALLENGE?
